<h3 id="X10827">X(10827)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: AQUILA AND OUTER-JOHNSON</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-(b+c)*a^3+(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(10827) = (R-r)*X(1)+4*r*X(5) = 4*r*X(10)+(R-r)*X(46)</b>
<p>X(10827) lies on these lines:{1,5}, {4,5119}, {8,6871}, {10,46}, {35,1012}, {36,474}, {40,3585}, {56,9956}, {57,5270}, {65,5790}, {72,3679}, {79,2093}, {165,10483}, {226,6984}, {381,3057}, {388,1737}, {443,7284}, {484,9579}, {498,515}, {499,6983}, {535,4652}, {944,6879}, {946,6968}, {950,10056}, {1000,3855}, {1125,6931}, {1155,9655}, {1319,1656}, {1479,6957}, {1697,3583}, {1699,5697}, {1709,6256}, {1727,7330}, {1770,5229}, {1836,5690}, {1883,5130}, {2098,9955}, {2476,5176}, {3085,4313}, {3090,3476}, {3486,8164}, {3576,6958}, {3579,4333}, {3584,3601}, {3586,3746}, {3617,4295}, {3634,4311}, {3751,5820}, {3811,5086}, {3911,4317}, {4007,4053}, {4293,9780}, {4297,6966}, {4299,6684}, {4312,5220}, {4338,9656}, {4861,5141}, {5223,5832}, {5231,5288}, {5253,7705}, {5258,5705}, {5261,6993}, {5290,5902}, {5445,5791}, {5812,7991}, {5919,9669}, {6702,10074}, {6735,10522}, {10789,10795}</p>
<p>
X(10827) = reflection of X(3612) in X(498)<br>
X(10827) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,5587,10826), (1,7989,7741), (4,10039,5119), (5,5252,1), (10,1478,46), (12,355,1), (388,1737,3338), (388,5818,1737), (474,5123,1698), (495,1837,1), (1698,9613,36), (5219,5881,1), (5229,5657,1770), (5587,9578,1), (5790,9654,65), (10106,10175,499)<br></p>
